name: universal-cloud-connector
description: Connects Claude Desktop to any remote SSE-enabled MCP server (VPS, Cloudflare, GitHub, Docker, etc.).
author: MCP Community

configurationSchema.title: Universal Cloud Connector Configuration
configurationSchema.description: Configure connection to a remote SSE-enabled MCP server

server_url.title: Server URL
server_url.description: The full URL to the SSE endpoint (e.g., https://my-vps.com/sse or https://my-server.com/mcp/sse). If the path ends with /sse, messages will be POSTed to /messages. Otherwise, /messages will be appended.

api_token.title: API Token
api_token.description: Bearer token for authentication with the remote server. This will be sent as: Authorization: Bearer <api_token>
